items.title: Get Down to Bizness
items.synopsis: Scores of people attend motivational conferences to better themselves and others.

items.title: Back it Up
items.synopsis: Real-life chiropractors perform spinal miracles on skeptical patients.

items.title: Solar Powered Madness
items.synopsis: Calculators gather sun strength and perform ridiculous calculations.

items.title: Great White Sharks
items.synopsis: A team of lawyers in rural South Dakota part ways after a brutal landslide disrupts the town residents.

items.title: Take a Tour
items.synopsis: Johnny Youth tours the world after winning the Heisman Trophy

items.title: Hillary Greer's Opus
items.synopsis: Hillary takes to the stage at a school for nuns.

items.title: Swift Justice in St. Petersburg
items.synopsis: Russian diplomats seek revenge after a terrorist attack.

items.title: Blood Hounds 3
items.synopsis: 3 blood thirsty dogs attack a gang of wolves and win.
